O.id O_id, O.order_no O_order_no, O.voucher_price O_voucher_price, O.voucher_use_id O_voucher_use_id, O.platform_id O_platform_id, O.expector_id O_expector_id, O.accept_user_id O_accept_user_id, O.recommend_id O_recommend_id, O.appointment_time O_appointment_time, O.accept_time O_accept_time, O.transaction_id O_transaction_id, O.schedule O_schedule, O.device O_device, O.remarks O_remarks, O.status O_status, O.create_time O_create_time, O.creator_id O_creator_id

O.id id, O.order_no orderNo, O.voucher_price voucherPrice, O.voucher_use_id voucherUseId, O.platform_id platformId, O.expector_id expectorId, O.accept_user_id acceptUserId, O.recommend_id recommendId, O.appointment_time appointmentTime, O.accept_time acceptTime, O.transaction_id transactionId, O.schedule schedule, O.device device, O.remarks remarks, O.status status, O.create_time createTime, O.creator_id creatorId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `ORDER`( id, order_no, voucher_price, voucher_use_id, platform_id, expector_id, accept_user_id, recommend_id, appointment_time, accept_time, transaction_id, schedule, device, remarks, status, create_time, creator_id )VALUES( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voucherPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{voucherUseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acceptUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommendId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schedule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{device,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO `ORDER`( id, order_no, voucher_price, voucher_use_id, platform_id, expector_id, accept_user_id, recommend_id, appointment_time, accept_time, transaction_id, schedule, device, remarks, status, create_time, creator_id ) VALUES
( #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.voucherPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.voucherUseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expectorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acceptUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recommendId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.appointmentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.acceptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.schedule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.device,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE O FROM `ORDER` O WHERE O.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE `ORDER` O SET O.STATUS = -1 WHERE O.ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT o.id, o.order_no, o.appointment_time, o.create_time, og.goods_id goods_id, og.title, g.sub_title, g.content, si.url, og.pay_price, oo.detail_address, og.price, t.pay_type, o. SCHEDULE FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN order_goods og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN order_other oo ON oo.order_id = o.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON og.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN service_images si ON o.id = si.source_id LEFT JOIN `transaction` t ON o.id = t.order_id WHERE o.creator_id = #{userId} <<<<<<< HEAD AND o.`status` = 1
AND o.schedule = #{schedule}

SELECT DISTINCT o.id order_id, o.order_no, o.voucher_price, o.voucher_use_id, o.platform_id, o.expector_id, o.accept_user_id, o.appointment_time, o.accept_time, u.phone nursePhone, o.transaction_id, os.patient_name userName, os.patient_phone phone, o.`schedule`, o.device, o.remarks, o.`status`, o.create_time, o.creator_id, og.id AS og_id, og.order_id AS og_order_id, og.goods_id AS og_goods_id, og.title AS og_title, og.price AS og_price, og.pay_price AS og_pay_price, og.profit AS og_profit, og.expector_id AS og_expector_id, og.executor_id AS og_executor_id, og.`status` AS og_status, og.create_time AS og_create_time, og.remark AS og_remark, oo.id AS oo_id, oo.order_id AS oo_order_id, oo.department_id AS oo_department_id, oo.hospital AS oo_hospital, oo.address AS oo_address, oo.detail_address AS oo_detail_address, oo.drug AS oo_drug, oo.tool AS oo_tool, oo.public_name AS oo_public_name, oo.public_content AS oo_public_content, oo.`status` AS oo_status, oo.create_time AS oo_create_time, oo.creator_id AS oo_creator_id, oo.remarks AS oo_remarks, g.id AS g_id, g.product_id AS g_product_id, g.title AS g_title, g.sub_title AS g_sub_title, g.content AS g_content, g.tijian_type_id AS g_tijian_type_id, g.tijian_hospital_id AS g_tijian_hospital_id, g.tool AS g_tool, g.insurance AS g_insurance, g.must AS g_must, g.type AS g_type, g.grade_type AS g_grade_type, g.sort AS g_sort, g.remark AS g_remark, g.`status` AS g_status, g.create_time AS g_create_time, g.creator_id AS g_creator_id, g.creator_name AS g_creator_name, si.url, t.id AS t_id, t.order_id AS t_order_id, t.amount AS t_amount, t.score AS t_score, t.operate AS t_operate, t.operate_source AS t_operate_source, t.remark AS t_remark, t.withdraw AS t_withdraw, t.pay_type AS t_pay_type, t.out_trade_no AS t_out_trade_no, t.creator_id AS t_creator_id, t.creator_name AS t_creator_name, t.create_time AS t_create_time, t.`status` AS t_status FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN order_goods og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN order_other oo ON o.id =oo.order_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON og.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN service_images si ON o.id =si.source_id LEFT JOIN order_service os ON o.id =os.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.accept_user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `transaction` t ON t.order_id = o.id

SELECT o.id order_id, o.order_no, o.voucher_price, o.voucher_use_id, o.platform_id, o.expector_id, o.accept_user_id, o.appointment_time, o.accept_time, o.transaction_id, o.`schedule`, o.device, o.remarks, o.create_time, o.creator_id, oo.id AS oo_id, oo.order_id AS oo_order_id, oo.department_id AS oo_department_id, oo.hospital AS oo_hospital, oo.address AS oo_address, oo.detail_address AS oo_detail_address, oo.drug AS oo_drug, oo.tool AS oo_tool, oo.public_name AS oo_public_name, oo.public_content AS oo_public_content, oo.status AS oo_status, oo.create_time AS oo_create_time, oo.creator_id AS oo_creator_id, oo.remarks AS oo_remarks, og.id AS og_id, og.order_id AS og_order_id, og.goods_id AS og_goods_id, og.title AS og_title, og.price AS og_price, og.pay_price AS og_pay_price, og.profit AS og_profit, og.expector_id AS og_expector_id, og.executor_id AS og_executor_id, og.`status` AS og_status, og.create_time AS og_create_time, og.remark AS og_remark, u.phone AS userPhone, u.name AS userName, u.sex AS userSex, si.url FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN order_other oo ON o.`id`=oo.`order_id` LEFT JOIN order_goods og ON o.`id`=og.`order_id` LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.`creator_id`=u.`id` LEFT JOIN service_images si ON og.`goods_id`=si.`source_id` WHERE o.status=#{status} AND si.`device_type`=2 AND o.accept_user_id IS NULL AND o.`schedule`=#{schedule} ORDER BY o.create_time DESC

og_executor_id, og.`status` og_status, og.create_time og_create_time, og.remark og_remark, os.id os_id, os.order_id os_order_id, os.price os_price, os.nurse_id os_nurse_id, os.patient_name os_patient_name, os.patient_phone os_patient_phone, os.expector_doctor os_expector_doctor, os.schedule os_schedule, os.appointment_time os_appointment_time, os.setout_time os_setout_time, os.start_service_time os_start_service_time, os.end_service_time os_end_service_time, os.remind_time os_remind_time, os.confirm_time os_confirm_time, os.status os_status, os.create_time os_create_time, os.creator_id os_creator_id, os.creator_name os_creator_name, si.url o_url FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN order_other oo ON o.`id`=oo.`order_id` LEFT JOIN order_goods og ON o.`id`=og.`order_id` LEFT JOIN order_service os ON o.`id`=os.`order_id` LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.`creator_id`=u.`id` LEFT JOIN service_images si ON og.`goods_id`=si.`source_id` WHERE o.status=1 AND o.accept_user_id=#{acceptUserId} AND si.`device_type`=2 AND o.id=#{id} ORDER BY o.appointment_time DESC

SELECT o.id order_id, o.order_no, o.voucher_price, o.voucher_use_id, o.platform_id, o.expector_id, o.accept_user_id, o.appointment_time, o.accept_time, o.transaction_id, o.`schedule`, o.device, o.remarks, o.create_time, o.creator_id, oo.id AS oo_id, oo.order_id AS oo_order_id, oo.department_id AS oo_department_id, oo.hospital AS oo_hospital, oo.address AS oo_address, oo.detail_address AS oo_detail_address, oo.drug AS oo_drug, oo.tool AS oo_tool, oo.public_name AS oo_public_name, oo.public_content AS oo_public_content, oo.status AS oo_status, oo.create_time AS oo_create_time, oo.creator_id AS oo_creator_id, oo.remarks AS oo_remarks, og.id AS og_id, og.order_id AS og_order_id, og.goods_id AS og_goods_id, og.title AS og_title, og.price AS og_price, og.pay_price AS og_pay_price, og.profit AS og_profit, og.expector_id AS og_expector_id, og.executor_id AS og_executor_id, og.`status` AS og_status, og.create_time AS og_create_time, og.remark AS og_remark, u.phone AS userPhone, u.name AS userName, u.sex AS userSex, os.id AS osId, os.patient_name AS patientName, os.patient_phone AS patientPhone, os.setout_time AS setoutTime, si.url FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN order_other oo ON o.`id`=oo.`order_id` LEFT JOIN order_goods og ON o.`id`=og.`order_id` LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.`creator_id`=u.`id` LEFT JOIN order_service os ON o.`id`=os.`order_id` LEFT JOIN service_images si ON og.`goods_id`=si.`source_id` WHERE o.status=#{status} AND o.accept_user_id=#{acceptUserId} AND os.`schedule`=#{os_schedule} AND si.`device_type`=2 AND o.`schedule`=#{schedule} ORDER BY o.appointment_time ASC LIMIT 1
